meanings.definition: A person who signs a document.
meanings.sent1: The signees on the contract were happy to finalize the deal.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer collected signatures from all the signees of the agreement.
meanings.sent3: The signees at the meeting were eager to put pen to paper.
meanings.sent4: The group of signees stood out as the key decision-makers in the room.
meanings.sent5: The signees added their names to the important document with care.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'signee', referring to multiple people who have signed a document.
meanings.sent1: All the signees of the petition gathered to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent2: The contract was binding once all the signees had signed it.
meanings.sent3: The signees formed a line to sign the document, creating a unique sight.
meanings.sent4: The signees were like a team, each contributing to the final outcome.
meanings.sent5: The group of signees worked together to make their mark on the agreement.
